Class ClientPermissionsForm

  • java.lang.Object

extends Object
    The Class ClientPermissionsForm handles the input from the change of client permissions form.

    • Method Detail

      • isAllowAllReadWriteForUsers

        public boolean isAllowAllReadWriteForUsers()
        Returns:
        True if all users are able to create global channels (all can read/write).

      • isAllowPublicAccess

        public boolean isAllowPublicAccess()
        Returns:
        True if all users are able to allow public to access a blog.

      • isAllowTopicCreateForAllUsers

        public boolean isAllowTopicCreateForAllUsers()
        Returns:
        true if all users are allowed to create topics. false only client admins are allowed to do so

      • isCreatePersonalTopic

        public boolean isCreatePersonalTopic()
        Returns:
        true if personal topics are created for new users

      • isDisablePublicBlog

        public boolean isDisablePublicBlog()
        Returns:
        the disablePublicBlog

        Returns:
        the resetGlobalAccess

        Parameters:
        allowAllReadWriteForUsers - True or false.
